original_text: Perhaps a man may meet a girl who has not had sex with anyone before. She has not yet promised to marry anyone. The man may be too strong and he has sex with her.
korean_text: 만일 남자가 약혼하지 아니한 처녀를 만나 그를 붙들고 동침하는 중에 그 두 사람이 발견되면

sentences.original_text: Perhaps a man may meet a girl
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 한 남자가 소녀를 만날 수도 있고

sentences.original_text: who has not had sex with anyone before
She has not yet promised to marry anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 아직 누구와도 결혼하기로 약속하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: The man may be too strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자가 너무 힘이 셀 수 있다

sentences.original_text: and he has sex with her
